00027     template<class model_t,std::size_t N_in,std::size_t N_out,class rng_t>class process_generator: public MC_generator<typename model_t::value_type>,public ps_generator_base<model_t>,public phase_space_cut,public scale_expression<typename model_t::value_type>
00028     {
00029         friend class event_generator<model_t,N_in,N_out,rng_t>;

00049             /* Utility function: */
00050 
00051             static bool accept(const value_type& f)
00052             {
00053                 if(f==f and f!=std::numeric_limits<value_type>::infinity() and !(f<(value_type)0))
00054                 {
00055                     return true;
00056                 }
00057 //              LOG(warning)<<"Integrand "<<f<<" was not accepted by process generator..."<<ENDLOG(warning);
00058                 return false;
00059             }

00081             
00082             static process_generator<model_t,N_in,N_out,rng_t>* read(CM_algorithm<model_t,N_in,N_out>& algo,std::istream& is)
00083             {
00084                 std::string line;
00085                 while(line!="<procgen>" and !is.eof())
00086                 {
00087                     std::getline(is,line);
00088                 }
00089                 if(is.eof())
00090                 {
00091                     LOG(warning)<<"End of file reached before process generator flag was read..."<<ENDLOG(warning);
00092                     return NULL;
00093                 }
00094                 process_generator<model_t,N_in,N_out,rng_t>* result=create_instance_noflags(algo,is,false);
00095                 while(line!="</procgen>" and !is.eof())
00096                 {
00097                     std::getline(is,line);
00098                 }
00099                 return result;
00100             }
00101 
00104             
00105             static process_generator<model_t,N_in,N_out,rng_t>* read(CM_algorithm<model_t,N_in,N_out>& algo,const std::string& filename)
00106             {
00107                 std::ifstream ifs;
00108                 ifs.open(filename.c_str());
00109                 if(!ifs.is_open())
00110                 {
00111                     LOG(warning)<<"Error opening input file "<<filename<<"... returning NULL."<<ENDLOG(warning);
00112                     return NULL;
00113                 }
00114                 return read(algo,ifs);
00115             }

00120 
00121             static process_generator<model_t,N_in,N_out,rng_t>* read(CM_algorithm<model_t,N_in,N_out>& algo,generator_configuration<model_t>& settings,std::istream& is)
00122             {
00123                 process_generator<model_t,N_in,N_out,rng_t>* result=create_instance(algo,is);
00124                 result->insert_cut(&settings);
00125                 result->insert_scale(&settings);
00126                 return result;
00127             }

00139                     LOG(warning)<<"Error opening input file "<<filename<<"... returning NULL."<<ENDLOG(warning);

00194                 {
00195                     delete ps_gen;

00197                 if(hel_gen!=NULL)
00198                 {
00199                     delete hel_gen;
00200                 }
00201                 if(col_gen!=NULL)
00202                 {
00203                     delete col_gen;
00204                 }
00205             }

00212             
00213             void configure()
00214             {
00215                 set_helicity_generator();
00216                 set_colour_generator();
00217                 set_phase_space_generator();
00218                 if(Camorra::auto_channel_adapt())
00219                 {
00220                     set_auto_channel_adapt(auto_channel_batch());
00221                 }
00222                 if(Camorra::auto_grid_adapt())
00223                 {
00224                     set_auto_grid_adapt(auto_grid_batch());
00225                 }
00226                 max_rejects=max_init_rejects();
00227                 if(discarded_weight_fraction()>(value_type)0 and discarded_weight_fraction()<(value_type)1)
00228                 {
00229                     this->bin_weights(weight_bins());
00230                     this->reduce_max_weight(discarded_weight_fraction());
00231                 }
00232                 set_pre_init_events(Camorra::pre_init_events());
00233             }
00234 
00237             
00238             void configure(generator_configuration<model_t>& settings)
00239             {
00240                 settings.lock_generator(this);
00241                 basic_cuts::clear();
00242                 settings.configure();
00243                 configure();
00244                 insert_scale(&settings);
00245                 insert_cut(&settings);
00246             }

00250 
00251             void pre_initialise(bool verbose=false)
00252             {
00253                 if(verbose)
00254                 {
00255                     std::stringstream ss;
00256                     print_process(ss);
00257                     std::cout<<"pre-init subprocess "<<ss.str();
00258                     std::cout.flush();
00259                 }
00260                 size_type batch=pre_init_evts/10;
00261                 for(size_type i=0;i<pre_init_evts;++i)
00262                 {
00263                     throw_event();
00264                     this->refresh_cross_section();
00265                     if((i%batch==0) and verbose)
00266                     {
00267                         std::cout<<'.';
00268                         std::cout.flush();
00269                     }
00270                 }
00271                 if(verbose)
00272                 {
00273                     std::cout<<this->cross_section()<<std::endl;
00274                 }
00275             }
00276

00283             }

00297 
00298             void initialise(size_type channel_iters,size_type channel_batch,size_type grid_iters,size_type grid_batch,bool verbose=false)
00299             {
00300                 if(zero_me)
00301                 {
00302                     size_type ntot=channel_iters*channel_batch+grid_iters*grid_batch;
00303                     for(size_type i=0;i<ntot;++i)
00304                     {
00305                         generate();
00306                     }
00307                     if(verbose)
00308                     {
00309                         std::cout<<"no adaptations performed for zero matrix element."<<std::endl;
00310                     }
00311                     return;
00312                 }
00313                 size_type batch=channel_iters*channel_batch/10;
00314                 size_type count=0;
00315                 if(verbose)
00316                 {
00317                     std::cout<<"adapting ps channels";
00318                     std::cout.flush();
00319                 }
00320                 for(size_type i=0;i<channel_iters;++i)
00321                 {
00322                     for(size_type j=0;j<channel_batch;++j)
00323                     {
00324                         throw_pos_weight_event();
00325                         if((++count)%batch==0 and verbose)
00326                         {
00327                             std::cout<<'.';
00328                             std::cout.flush();
00329                         }
00330                     }
00331                     adapt_channels();
00332                 }
00333                 if(verbose)
00334                 {
00335                     std::cout<<"done"<<std::endl;
00336                 }
00337                 batch=grid_iters*grid_batch/10;
00338                 count=0;
00339                 if(verbose)
00340                 {
00341                     std::cout<<"adapting grids";
00342                     std::cout.flush();
00343                 }
00344                 for(size_type i=0;i<grid_iters;++i)
00345                 {
00346                     for(size_type j=0;j<grid_batch;++j)
00347                     {
00348                         throw_pos_weight_event();
00349                         if((++count)%batch==0 and verbose)
00350                         {
00351                             std::cout<<'.';
00352                             std::cout.flush();
00353                         }
00354                     }
00355                     adapt_grids();
00356                 }
00357                 if(verbose)
00358                 {
00359                     std::cout<<"done"<<std::endl;
00360                 }
00361             }

00364 
00365             helicity_generator_type* set_helicity_generator(helicity_generators::type t=Camorra::helicity_generator_type())
00366             {
00367                 if(hel_gen!=NULL)
00368                 {
00369                     delete hel_gen;
00370                 }
00371                 hel_gen=helicity_generator_factory<model_t,N_in,N_out,rng_t>::create_instance(amplitude,t);
00372                 hel_factor=(hel_gen==NULL)?(value_type)1:(hel_gen->averaging_factor());
00373                 if(hel_gen!=NULL)
00374                 {
00375                     for(size_type i=0;i<(N_in+N_out);++i)
00376                     {
00377                         summed_spins[i]=hel_gen->sum_helicity(i);
00378                     }
00379                 }
00380                 return hel_gen;
00381             }
00382 
00384 
00385             colour_generator_type* set_colour_generator(colour_generators::type t=Camorra::colour_generator_type())
00386             {
00387                 if(col_gen!=NULL)
00388                 {
00389                     delete col_gen;
00390                 }
00391                 col_gen=colour_generator_factory<model_t,N_in,N_out,rng_t>::create_instance(amplitude,t);
00392                 col_factor=(col_gen==NULL)?(value_type)1:(col_gen->averaging_factor());
00393                 if(col_gen!=NULL)
00394                 {
00395                     for(size_type i=0;i<(N_in+N_out);++i)
00396                     {
00397                         summed_colours[i]=col_gen->sum_colour(i);
00398                     }
00399                 }
00400                 return col_gen;
00401             }

00460 
00461             bool refresh_m_min()
00462             {
00463                 if(ps_gen!=NULL)
00464                 {
00465                     for(int i=1;i<=N_out;++i)
00466                     {
00467                         for(int j=i+1;j<=N_out;++j)
00468                         {
00469                             ps_gen->set_m_min(i,j,basic_cuts::m_min(i,j));
00470                         }
00471                     }
00472                     return ps_gen->refresh_m_min();
00473                 }
00474                 return true;
00475             }

00489 
00490             bool generate_momenta()
00491             {
00492                 if(ps_gen!=NULL)
00493                 {
00494                     if(ps_gen->generate())
00495                     {
00496                         ps_factor=ps_gen->integrand();
00497                         ps_weight=ps_gen->weight();
00498                         return true;
00499                     }
00500                     else
00501                     {
00502                         ps_factor=ps_gen->integrand();
00503                         ps_weight=(value_type)0;
00504                         return false;
00505                     }
00506                 }
00507                 else
00508                 {
00509                     ps_weight=(value_type)1;
00510                 }
00511                 return true;
00512             }
00513 
00516 
00517             bool evaluate_phase_space_weight()
00518             {
00519                 if(ps_gen!=NULL)
00520                 {
00521                     if(ps_gen->evaluate_weight())
00522                     {
00523                         ps_factor=ps_gen->integrand();
00524                         ps_weight=ps_gen->weight();
00525                         return true;
00526                     }
00527                     else
00528                     {
00529                         ps_factor=ps_gen->integrand();
00530                         ps_weight=(value_type)0;
00531                         return false;
00532                     }
00533                 }
00534                 else
00535                 {
00536                     ps_weight=(value_type)1;
00537                 }
00538                 return true;
00539             }

00638 
00639             void evaluate_amplitude()
00640             {
00641                 amplitude->reset();
00642                 if(alpha_pdf)
00643                 {
00644                     value_type as=ps_gen->alpha_s();
00645                     if(as!=value_type(-1))
00646                     {
00647                         model_type::set_alpha_s(as);
00648                     }
00649                     else if(scale!=NULL)
00650                     {
00651                         model_type::set_QCD_scale(scale->R_scale());
00652                     }
00653                 }
00654                 else if(scale!=NULL)
00655                 {
00656                     model_type::set_QCD_scale(scale->R_scale());
00657                 }
00658                 if(summed_spins.any() or summed_colours.any())
00659                 {
00660                     me=amplitude->evaluate(summed_spins,summed_colours);
00661                     return;
00662                 }
00663                 me=std::norm(amplitude->evaluate());
00664             }
00665 
00668 
00669             bool generate()
00670             {
00671                 throw_event();
00672                 if(auto_update)
00673                 {
00674                     update();
00675                     this->refresh_cross_section();
00676                 }
00677                 if(update_counter==0)
00678                 {
00679                     return true;
00680                 }
00681                 if(auto_grid_adapt!=0)
00682                 {
00683                     if(update_counter%auto_grid_adapt==0)
00684                     {
00685                         adapt_grids();
00686                     }
00687                 }
00688                 if(auto_channel_adapt!=0)
00689                 {
00690                     if(update_counter%auto_channel_adapt==0)
00691                     {
00692                         adapt_channels();
00693                     }
00694                 }
00695                 return true;
00696             }
00697 
00699 
00700             void generate_unweighted(bool verbose=false)
00701             {
00702                 if(verbose)
00703                 {
00704                     std::cout<<"generating event for ";
00705                     print_process(std::cout);
00706                     std::cout<<"......";
00707                     std::cout.flush();
00708                 }
00709                 if(zero_me)
00710                 {
00711                     generate();
00712                     return;
00713                 }
00714                 value_type rho;
00715                 do
00716                 {
00717                     generate();
00718                     if(!valid(tot_weight))
00719                     {
00720                         continue;
00721                     }
00722                     rho=rn_stream::throw_number((value_type)0,this->max_w_eps);
00723                 }
00724                 while(rho>tot_weight);
00725                 tot_weight=this->cross_section().value;
00726                 this->refresh_max_weight();
00727                 this->weight()=tot_weight;
00728                 this->integrand()=(value_type)1;
00729                 if(verbose)
00730                 {
00731                     std::cout<<".....done."<<std::endl;
00732                 }
00733             }
00734 
00736 
00737             bool evaluate_weight()
00738             {
00739                 if(!(evaluate_phase_space_weight() and evaluate_helicity_weight() and evaluate_colour_weight()))
00740                 {
00741                     this->weight()=(value_type)0;
00742                     set_integrands(0);
00743                     return false;
00744                 }
00745                 this->weight()=ps_weight*hel_weight*col_weight;
00746                 value_type f=pb_conversion*symmetry_factor*ps_factor*hel_factor*col_factor;
00747                 if(f!=(value_type)0)
00748                 {
00749                     evaluate_amplitude();
00750                     if(!accept(me))
00751                     {
00752                         this->weight()=(value_type)0;
00753                         set_integrands(0);
00754                         return false;
00755                     }
00756                     f*=me;
00757                 }
00758                 set_integrands(f);
00759                 if(auto_update)
00760                 {
00761                     update();
00762                     this->refresh_cross_section();
00763                 }
00764                 if(update_counter==0)
00765                 {
00766                     return true;
00767                 }
00768                 if(auto_grid_adapt!=0)
00769                 {
00770                     if(update_counter%auto_grid_adapt==0)
00771                     {
00772                         adapt_grids();
00773                     }
00774                 }
00775                 if(auto_channel_adapt!=0)
00776                 {
00777                     if(update_counter%auto_channel_adapt==0)
00778                     {
00779                         adapt_channels();
00780                     }
00781                 }
00782                 return true;
00783             }
00784 
00786 
00787             bool pass()
00788             {
00789                 return (ps_gen==NULL)?false:(ps_gen->pass());
00790             }
00791 
00793 
00794             void update()
00795             {
00796                 bool q=false;
00797                 if(ps_gen!=NULL)
00798                 {
00799                     if(accept(ps_gen->integrand()))
00800                     {
00801                         ps_gen->update();
00802                         q=true;
00803                     }
00804                 }
00805                 if(hel_gen!=NULL)
00806                 {
00807                     if(accept(hel_gen->integrand()))
00808                     {
00809                         hel_gen->update();
00810                         q=true;
00811                     }
00812                 }
00813                 if(col_gen!=NULL)
00814                 {
00815                     if(accept(col_gen->integrand()))
00816                     {
00817                         col_gen->update();
00818                         q=true;
00819                     }
00820                 }
00821                 if(q)
00822                 {
00823                     ++update_counter;
00824                 }
00825             }
00826 
00828 
00829             void adapt_grids()
00830             {
00831                 if(ps_gen!=NULL)
00832                 {
00833                     ps_gen->adapt_grids();
00834                     ++grid_adaptations;
00835                 }
00836             }
00837 
00839 
00840             void adapt_channels()
00841             {
00842                 if(ps_gen!=NULL)
00843                 {
00844                     ps_gen->adapt_channels();
00845                     ++channel_adaptations;
00846                 }
00847             }
00848 
00850 
00851             void adapt()
00852             {
00853                 bool q;
00854                 if(ps_gen!=NULL)
00855                 {
00856                     ps_gen->adapt();
00857                     q=true;
00858                 }
00859                 if(hel_gen!=NULL)
00860                 {
00861                     hel_gen->adapt();
00862                     q=true;
00863                 }
00864                 if(col_gen!=NULL)
00865                 {
00866                     col_gen->adapt();
00867                     q=true;
00868                 }
00869                 if(q)
00870                 {
00871                     ++grid_adaptations;
00872                     ++channel_adaptations;
00873                 }
00874             }
00875 
00877 
00878             void reset()
00879             {
00880                 this->base_type::reset();
00881                 if(ps_gen!=NULL)
00882                 {
00883                     ps_gen->reset();
00884                 }
00885                 if(hel_gen!=NULL)
00886                 {
00887                     hel_gen->reset();
00888                 }
00889                 if(col_gen!=NULL)
00890                 {
00891                     col_gen->reset();
00892                 }
00893                 evt_counter=0;
00894                 pos_evt_counter=0;
00895                 update_counter=0;
00896                 grid_adaptations=0;
00897                 channel_adaptations=0;
00898             }
00899 
00901 
00902             bool refresh_params()
00903             {
00904                 zero_me=(amplitude->count_diagrams()==(long long unsigned)0);
00905                 if(ps_gen!=NULL)
00906                 {
00907                     return ps_gen->refresh_params();
00908                 }
00909                 return true;
00910             }
00911 
00914 
00915             void set_auto_update(bool q)
00916             {
00917                 auto_update=q;
00918             }
00919 
00922 
00923             void set_auto_channel_adapt(size_type n)
00924             {
00925                 auto_channel_adapt=n;
00926                 if(n!=0)
00927                 {
00928                     set_auto_update(true);
00929                 }
00930             }
00931 
00933 
00934             void unset_auto_channel_adapt()
00935             {
00936                 auto_channel_adapt=0;
00937             }
00938 
00941 
00942             void set_auto_grid_adapt(size_type n)
00943             {
00944                 auto_grid_adapt=n;
00945                 if(n!=0)
00946                 {
00947                     set_auto_update(true);
00948                 }
00949             }
00950 
00952 
00953             void unset_auto_grid_adapt()
00954             {
00955                 auto_grid_adapt=0;
00956             }
00957 
00959 
00960             void set_optimal_multichannel()
00961             {
00962                 if(ps_gen!=NULL)
00963                 {
00964                     ps_gen->set_optimal_multichannel();
00965                 }
00966             }
00967 
00969 
00970             bool set_pre_init_events(size_type n)
00971             {
00972                 pre_init_evts=n;
00973             }
00974 
00976 
00977             void set_pdf_alpha_s(bool q)
00978             {
00979                 alpha_pdf=q;
00980             }
00981 
00983 
00984             void collect()
00985             {
00986                 this->weight()=ps_weight*hel_weight*col_weight;
00987                 value_type f=pb_conversion*symmetry_factor*ps_factor*hel_factor*col_factor;
00988                 if(accept(me))
00989                 {
00990                     set_integrands(me*f);
00991                 }
00992                 else
00993                 {
00994                     set_integrands(0);
00995                 }
00996             }

01149                     result*=hel_factor;
01150                 }
01151                 if(with_cols)
01152                 {
01153                     result*=col_factor;
01154                 }

01338 
01340             
01341             std::ostream& print_status(std::ostream& os=std::cout) const
01342             {
01343                 os<<"###############################################################################################"<<std::endl;
01344                 os<<"Nr of events generated:                            "<<std::scientific<<evt_counter<<std::endl;
01345                 os<<"Nr of positive weight events generated:            "<<std::scientific<<pos_evt_counter<<std::endl;
01346                 os<<"Nr of events contributing to cross-section:        "<<std::scientific<<this->calls()<<std::endl;
01347                 os<<"Nr of updates performed:                           "<<std::scientific<<update_counter<<std::endl;
01348                 os<<"Nr of grid adaptations performed:                  "<<std::scientific<<grid_adaptations<<std::endl;
01349                 os<<"Nr of channel adaptations performed:               "<<std::scientific<<channel_adaptations<<std::endl;
01350                 os<<"Monte Carlo efficiency (%):                        "<<std::scientific<<this->efficiency()<<std::endl;
01351                 os<<"Cross section (pb):                                "<<std::scientific<<this->cross_section()<<std::endl;
01352                 os<<"###############################################################################################"<<std::endl;
01353             }
01354 
01356 
01357             std::ostream& print_weights(std::ostream& os=std::cout) const
01358             {
01359                 os<<"###############################################################################################"<<std::endl;
01360                 os<<"Matrix element:                                    "<<std::scientific<<me<<std::endl;
01361                 os<<"Phase space weight:                                "<<std::scientific<<ps_weight<<std::endl;
01362                 os<<"Helicity weight:                                   "<<std::scientific<<hel_weight<<std::endl;
01363                 os<<"Colour weight:                                     "<<std::scientific<<col_weight<<std::endl;
01364                 os<<"Phase space factor:                                "<<std::scientific<<ps_factor<<std::endl;
01365                 os<<"Helicity factor:                                   "<<std::scientific<<hel_factor<<std::endl;
01366                 os<<"Colour factor:                                     "<<std::scientific<<col_factor<<std::endl;
01367                 os<<"Symmetry factor:                                   "<<std::scientific<<symmetry_factor<<std::endl;
01368                 os<<"Full integrand:                                    "<<std::scientific<<this->integrand()<<std::endl;
01369                 os<<"Full weight:                                       "<<std::scientific<<this->weight()<<std::endl;
01370                 os<<"###############################################################################################"<<std::endl;
01371             }

01379 
01381 
01382             std::ostream& print_settings(std::ostream& os=std::cout) const
01383             {
01384                 os<<std::setw(30)<<std::left<<"spin summmation:";
01385                 for(size_type i=0;i<(N_in+N_out);++i)
01386                 {
01387                     os<<summed_spins[i];
01388                 }
01389                 os<<std::endl;
01390                 os<<std::setw(30)<<std::left<<"helicity generator:";
01391                 if(hel_gen==NULL)
01392                 {
01393                     os<<"none"<<std::endl;
01394                 }
01395                 else
01396                 {
01397                     os<<hel_gen->type()<<std::endl;
01398                 }
01399                 os<<std::setw(30)<<std::left<<"colour summmation:";
01400                 for(size_type i=0;i<(N_in+N_out);++i)
01401                 {
01402                     os<<summed_colours[i];
01403                 }
01404                 os<<std::endl;
01405                 os<<std::setw(30)<<std::left<<"colour generator:";
01406                 if(col_gen==NULL)
01407                 {
01408                     os<<"none"<<std::endl;
01409                 }
01410                 else
01411                 {
01412                     os<<col_gen->type()<<std::endl;
01413                 }
01414                 os<<std::setw(30)<<std::left<<"momentum generator:";
01415                 if(ps_gen==NULL)
01416                 {
01417                     os<<"none"<<std::endl;
01418                 }
01419                 else
01420                 {
01421                     os<<ps_gen->type()<<std::endl;
01422                     ps_gen->print_settings(os);
01423                 }
01424                 return os;
01425             }
01426 
01428 
01429             std::istream& load(std::istream& is)
01430             {
01431                 this->base_type::load(is);
01432                 safe_read(is,alpha);
01433                 is>>evt_counter>>pos_evt_counter>>update_counter;
01434                 is>>grid_adaptations>>channel_adaptations>>summed_spins>>summed_colours;
01435                 is>>auto_update>>auto_grid_adapt>>auto_channel_adapt>>max_rejects>>alpha_pdf;
01436             }
01437 
01439 
01440             std::ostream& save(std::ostream& os) const
01441             {
01442                 os<<"<procgen>"<<std::endl;
01443                 os<<id<<std::endl;
01444                 print_process(os);
01445                 os<<std::endl;
01446                 if(ps_gen==NULL)
01447                 {
01448                     os<<'N'<<std::endl;
01449                 }
01450                 else
01451                 {
01452                     ps_gen->save(os);
01453                 }
01454                 if(col_gen==NULL)
01455                 {
01456                     os<<'N'<<std::endl;
01457                 }
01458                 else
01459                 {
01460                     col_gen->save(os);
01461                 }
01462                 if(hel_gen==NULL)
01463                 {
01464                     os<<'N'<<std::endl;
01465                 }
01466                 else
01467                 {
01468                     hel_gen->save(os);
01469                 }
01470                 this->base_type::save(os);
01471                 safe_write(os,alpha);
01472                 os<<"\t"<<evt_counter<<"\t"<<pos_evt_counter<<"\t"<<update_counter<<"\t";
01473                 os<<grid_adaptations<<"\t"<<channel_adaptations<<std::endl;
01474                 os<<summed_spins<<"\t"<<summed_colours;
01475                 os<<auto_update<<"\t"<<auto_grid_adapt<<"\t"<<auto_channel_adapt<<"\t"<<max_rejects<<"\t"<<alpha_pdf<<std::endl;
01476                 os<<"</procgen>"<<std::endl;
01477                 return os;
01478             }
01479 
01481 
01482             bool write(const std::string& filename) const
01483             {
01484                 std::ofstream ofs;
01485                 ofs.open(filename.c_str());
01486                 if(!ofs.is_open())
01487                 {
01488                     LOG(warning)<<"Error opening output file "<<filename<<"..."<<ENDLOG(warning);
01489                     return false;
01490                 }
01491                 save(ofs);
01492                 ofs.close();
01493                 return true;
01494             }
01495 
01496         private:
01497 
01498             /* Private static methods: */
01499             /*-------------------------*/
01500 
01501             /* Factory method from input stream, no request for input stream
01502              * process flags: */
01503             
01504             static process_generator<model_t,N_in,N_out,rng_t>* create_instance_noflags(CM_algorithm<model_t,N_in,N_out>& algo,std::istream& is,bool verbose=false)
01505             {
01506                 size_type id_;
01507                 is>>id_>>std::ws;
01508                 std::string procline;
01509                 std::getline(is,procline);
01510                 algo.set_process(procline);
01511                 if(!algo.valid_process())
01512                 {
01513                     LOG(warning)<<"Invalid process detected...returning NULL."<<ENDLOG(warning);
01514                     return NULL;
01515                 }
01516                 process_generator<model_t,N_in,N_out,rng_t>* result=new process_generator<model_t,N_in,N_out,rng_t>(algo.get_tree_iterator(),id_);
01517                 if(verbose)
01518                 {
01519                     std::cout<<"Created process generator instance..."<<std::endl;
01520                     std::cout<<"------------------"<<std::endl;
01521                     std::cout<<"Process:"<<std::endl;
01522                     std::cout<<"------------------"<<std::endl;
01523                     algo.get_tree_iterator()->print_process(std::cout);
01524                     std::cout<<std::endl;
01525                 }
01526                 is>>std::ws;
01527                 if(is.peek()=='N')
01528                 {
01529                     is.ignore(1);
01530                 }
01531                 else
01532                 {
01533                     result->ps_gen=ps_generator_factory<model_t,N_in,N_out,rng_t>::create_instance(algo.get_tree_iterator(),is);
01534                 }
01535                 is>>std::ws;
01536                 if(is.peek()=='N')
01537                 {
01538                     is.ignore(1);
01539                 }
01540                 else
01541                 {
01542                     result->col_gen=colour_generator_factory<model_t,N_in,N_out,rng_t,model_t::coloured>::create_instance(algo.get_tree_iterator(),is);
01543                     result->col_factor=(result->col_gen==NULL)?(value_type)1:(result->col_gen->averaging_factor());
01544                     if(result->col_gen!=NULL)
01545                     {
01546                         for(size_type i=0;i<(N_in+N_out);++i)
01547                         {
01548                             result->summed_colours[i]=result->col_gen->sum_colour(i);
01549                         }
01550                     }
01551                 }
01552                 is>>std::ws;
01553                 if(is.peek()=='N')
01554                 {
01555                     is.ignore(1);
01556                 }
01557                 else
01558                 {
01559                     result->hel_gen=helicity_generator_factory<model_t,N_in,N_out,rng_t>::create_instance(algo.get_tree_iterator(),is);
01560                     result->hel_factor=(result->hel_gen==NULL)?(value_type)1:(result->hel_gen->averaging_factor());
01561                     if(result->hel_gen!=NULL)
01562                     {
01563                         for(size_type i=0;i<(N_in+N_out);++i)
01564                         {
01565                             result->summed_spins[i]=result->hel_gen->sum_helicity(i);
01566                         }
01567                     }
01568                 }
01569                 result->load(is);
01570                 if(verbose)
01571                 {
01572                     std::cout<<"------------------"<<std::endl;
01573                     std::cout<<"Settings:"<<std::endl;
01574                     std::cout<<"------------------"<<std::endl;
01575                     result->print_settings(std::cout);
01576                 }
01577                 return result;
01578             }
01579 
01580             /* Private data members */
01581             /*----------------------*/
01582 
01583             /* Event counter: */
01584 
01585             size_type evt_counter;
01586 
01587             /* Nonzero-weight event counter: */
01588 
01589             size_type pos_evt_counter;
01590 
01591             /* Full weight variable. */
01592 
01593             value_type tot_weight;
01594 
01595             /* Multichannel weight variable. */
01596             
01597             value_type alpha;
01598 
01599             /* Camorra tree iterator for matrix-element calculation: */
01600 
01601             CM_tree_iterator amplitude;
01602 
01603             /* Helicity summation flags: */
01604 
01605             std::bitset<N_in+N_out>summed_spins;
01606 
01607             /* Colour summation flags: */
01608 
01609             std::bitset<N_in+N_out>summed_colours;
01610 
01612 
01613             bool zero_me;
01614 
01615             /* Matrix element, final state symmetry factor: */
01616 
01617             value_type me;
01618 
01619             /* Momentum generator instance: */
01620             
01621             ps_generator_type* ps_gen;
01622             
01623             /* Phase space weight and flux factor: */
01624             
01625             value_type ps_weight,ps_factor;
01626 
01627             /* Helicity generator instance: */
01628 
01629             helicity_generator_type* hel_gen;
01630             
01631             /* Helicity generator weight and normalisation factor: */
01632             
01633             value_type hel_weight,hel_factor;
01634 
01635             /* Colour generator instance: */
01636             
01637             colour_generator_type* col_gen;
01638 
01639             /* Colour generator weight and normalisation factor: */
01640 
01641             value_type col_weight,col_factor;
01642 
01643             /* Update counter: */
01644 
01645             size_type update_counter;
01646 
01647             /* Automatic update flag: */
01648 
01649             bool auto_update;
01650 
01651             /* Grid adaptation counter: */
01652 
01653             size_type grid_adaptations;
01654 
01655             /* Automatic grid adaptation batch size: */
01656 
01657             size_type auto_grid_adapt;
01658 
01659             /* Channel adaptation counter: */
01660 
01661             size_type channel_adaptations;
01662 
01663             /* Automatic channel adaptation batch size: */
01664 
01665             size_type auto_channel_adapt;
01666 
01667             /* Maximal nr of rejections for positive event generation: */
01668 
01669             size_type max_rejects;
01670 
01671             /* Pre-initialisation precision: */
01672 
01673             size_type pre_init_evts;
01674 
01675             /* Phase space cuts depending on this instance: */
01676 
01677             phase_space_cut* ps_cut;
01678 
01679             /* QCD scale expression instance: */
01680 
01681             scale_expression<value_type>* scale;
01682 
01683             /* Boolean denoting whether to adopt pdf's alpha: */
01684 
01685             bool alpha_pdf;
01686 
01687             /* Private constructor, no configuration performed: */
01688 
01689             process_generator(CM_tree_iterator it,size_type id_):id(id_),symmetry_factor(it->symmetry_factor()),evt_counter(0),pos_evt_counter(0),tot_weight(0),alpha(1),amplitude(it),zero_me(it->count_diagrams()==(long long unsigned)0),me(1),ps_gen(NULL),ps_weight(1),ps_factor(1),hel_gen(NULL),hel_weight(1),hel_factor(1),col_gen(NULL),col_weight(1),col_factor(1),update_counter(0),auto_update(false),grid_adaptations(0),auto_grid_adapt(0),channel_adaptations(0),auto_channel_adapt(0),max_rejects(std::numeric_limits<size_type>::max()),pre_init_evts(0),ps_cut(NULL),scale(NULL),alpha_pdf(Camorra::use_pdf_alpha_s())
01690             {
01691                 summed_spins.reset();
01692                 summed_colours.reset();
01693             }
01694 
01695             /* Integrand definition helper: */
01696 
01697             void set_integrands(const value_type& f)
01698             {
01699                 this->integrand()=f;
01700                 tot_weight=this->weight()*f;
01701                 if(hel_gen!=NULL)
01702                 {
01703                     hel_gen->integrand()=f;
01704                 }
01705                 if(col_gen!=NULL)
01706                 {
01707                     col_gen->integrand()=f;
01708                 }
01709                 if(ps_gen!=NULL)
01710                 {
01711                     ps_gen->integrand()=f*hel_weight*col_weight;
01712                 }
01713             }
01714 
01715             /* Event generation helper: */
01716 
01717             bool throw_event()
01718             {
01719                 ++evt_counter;
01720                 if(!(generate_momenta() and generate_helicities() and generate_colours()))
01721                 {
01722                     this->weight()=(value_type)0;
01723                     set_integrands(0);
01724                     return false;
01725                 }
01726                 else
01727                 {
01728                     this->weight()=ps_weight*hel_weight*col_weight;
01729                     value_type f=pb_conversion*symmetry_factor*ps_factor*hel_factor*col_factor;
01730                     if(f!=(value_type)0)
01731                     {
01732                         evaluate_amplitude();
01733                         if(accept(me))
01734                         {
01735                             set_integrands(me*f);
01736                         }
01737                         else
01738                         {
01739                             set_integrands(0);
01740                         }
01741                     }
01742                     else
01743                     {
01744                         set_integrands(0);
01745                     }
01746                 }
01747                 if(tot_weight!=(value_type)0)
01748                 {
01749                     ++pos_evt_counter;
01750                 }
01751                 return true;
01752             }
01753 
01754             /* Initialisation helper: */
01755 
01756             bool throw_pos_weight_event()
01757             {
01758                 size_type n(0);
01759                 do
01760                 {
01761                     throw_event();
01762                     update();
01763                     ++n;
01764                 }
01765                 while(tot_weight==(value_type)0 and (n<max_rejects));
01766                 return (tot_weight!=(value_type)0);
01767             }
01768     };
01769     template<class model_t,std::size_t N_in,std::size_t N_out,class rng_t>const typename process_generator<model_t,N_in,N_out,rng_t>::value_type process_generator<model_t,N_in,N_out,rng_t>::pb_conversion=0.389e+09;
01770 }
01771 
01772 #endif /*PROC_GEN_H_*/
